Nivea Men Age Defense Eye Cream

Brand: Nivea

Category: Around Eye Cream

Ingredients: WATER, GLYCERIN, METHYLPROPANEDIOL, BEHENYL ALCOHOL, CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE, CETYL ALCOHOL, STEARYL ALCOHOL, DISTARCH PHOSPHATE, GLYCERYL STEARATE CITRATE, DICAPRYLYL ETHER, COCOGLYCERIDES, SODIUM HYALURONATE, TOCOPHEROL, XANTHAN GUM, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, PHE

ODIUM HYDROXIDE, PHENOXYETHANOL, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
